mapper.sql: ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_TYPE, GOODS_LEVEL, GOODS_SORT, NOTES, ACTIVE, VIRTUAL_CODE, KEY_WORDS
mapper.select:
select
from BSE.T_BAS_PROHIBIT_GOODS where ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR} AND GOODS_SORT not in (${goodsSort})

select
from BSE.T_BAS_PROHIBIT_GOODS where ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR} and GOODS_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BSE.T_BAS_PROHIBIT_GOODS( ID, VIRTUAL_CODE, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_TYPE, GOODS_LEVEL, GOODS_SORT, NOTES, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, VERSION_NO, ACTIVE, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, KEY_WORDS) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{virtualCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSort, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versionNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{active, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyWords, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into BSE.T_BAS_PROHIBIT_GOODS
ID,
GOODS_NAME,
GOODS_TYPE,
GOODS_LEVEL,
GOODS_SORT,
NOTES,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
ACTIVE,
CREATE_USER_CODE,
MODIFY_USER_CODE,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update BSE.T_BAS_PROHIBIT_GOODS
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_LEVEL = #{goodsLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_SORT = #{goodsSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_USER_CODE = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEY_WORDS = #{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE BSE.T_BAS_PROHIBIT_GOODS A SET A.ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.VIRTUAL_CODE = #{virtualCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.GOODS_LEVEL = #{goodsLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.GOODS_SORT = #{goodsSort, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.NOTES = #{notes, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.CREATE_TIME = #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, A.MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, A.VERSION_NO = #{versionNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, A.ACTIVE = #{active, jdbcType=CHAR}, A.CREATE_USER_CODE = #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.KEY_WORDS = #{keyWords, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
